column1: # The February 1942 figure is identified as part-estimate on the sheet and has been retained.
# The May 1951 figure is as an estimate and has been omitted.
# The gauge was at a different location in Horncastle for the same observer, Mr F.J.Harvey, prior to this.
# The large October 1960 figure includes a contribution of over 7 inches on a single day (7th), causing extensive flooding in Horncastle.
# The station continued until 1973 according to MIDAS.
